label: Preference
comment: An involvement in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour that is liked or wanted more than another item.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A disliked item, expressed as text, for this experience item preference.
A preferred item, expressed as text, for this experience item preference.
The priority ranking number for this experience item preference.

referencedBy.comment: An experience item preference notified for this guest person.
